name: Random animal
description: For those days when you just really need to see some cute animals! Random animal, or really random cat or dog, is an app where you can get a random picture, gif or video of a cat or dog.

name: Weather App
description: What better way to learn a framework than to build an weather app! In this app you can search for a city and fetch the current weather.

name: Budget Planner
description: Still scribbling down your monthly budget on paper? Try budget planner, enter you'r income and monthly expenses and the app sums up everyhing and alerts if you'r exceeding your budget.
